name: Caroline (Prototype)
description:
This is a prototype and it may have some bugs funny things; 

Please leave your feedback <3; 

"Caroline" is a 2D, gameplay-based game, where you control a girl lost in a forest and her only chance of surviving is accepting the help of a stranger. It’s a game that asks the question: "Why do we kill people who kill others, to teach them that killing is wrong?".

  • Your objective is saving the guy with the red "hat";
  • You don't have the power to eliminate enemies, just he;
  • after he kills an enemy, he stays 2 seconds without the power to attack again;
  • You can push,pull or throw a stone in the enemies to save his life;

Controls

  1. Move & Jump- arrows; 
  2. X - Push or Pull enemys (press again at the right time to get up faster); 
  3. Z - Shoot (press to increase the force) ;
  4. R - Reset game;

Be careful with the sound;

The linux and mac version may have some bugs
